markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Rogues](/Rules.aspx?ID=1375)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 199</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Because rogues get skill increases at every level in the standard rules, they also get more Skill Points. Rogues gain double the number of Skill Points listed on Table 4–19.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Rogues

text: Rogues Source Gamemastery Guide pg. 199 Because rogues get skill increases at every level in the standard rules, they also get more Skill Points. Rogues gain double the number of Skill Points listed on Table 4–19.
